plot: Joe's tired of sleeping his way thought life and when he takes a chance on unrequited love he's bitten by the irony that someone else has taken a chance on him and he has forsaken her.
title: Sleepy Joe
plot_es: Joe's tired of sleeping his way thought life and when he takes a chance on unrequited love he's bitten by the irony that someone else has taken a chance on him and he has forsaken her.
